description.en: WEPN's inaugural artist release, featuring Sunbane's original track and a dub techno remix by Veins Full of Static.
description.cy: Rhyddhad artist cyntaf WEPN, yn cynnwys trac gwreiddiol gan Sunbane a remix dub techno gan Veins Full of Static.

description.en: A compilation showcasing a range of electronic styles including Detailed Comfort & SUBWFR.
description.cy: Casgliad sy'n dangos amrywiaeth o arddulliau electronig gan gynnwys Detailed Comfort & SUBWFR.

description.en: A 26-track compilation from Welsh electronic artists. Proceeds support humanitarian work in Ukraine.
description.cy: Casgliad 26-trac gan artistiaid electronig o Gymru. Elw'n mynd tuag at waith dyngarol yn Wcráin.

description.en: Explores the theme of transience in electronic composition.
description.cy: Yn archwilio thema trosbawredd mewn cyfansoddiad electronig.

description.en: Tracks built using only vocal samples, encouraging experimental techniques.
description.cy: Traciau a grëwyd gan ddefnyddio samplau llais yn unig, gan annog technegau arbrofol.

description.en: A themed release of tracks in 3/4 time.
description.cy: Rhyddhad thematig o draciau mewn amser 3/4.

description.en: Synth-driven release exploring retro sounds and memory.
description.cy: Rhyddhad sy'n archwilio synau retro a'r cof gan ddefnyddio syntheseiddwyr.

description.en: Each track made with only one instrument.
description.cy: Pob trac wedi'i greu gyda dim ond un offeryn.

description.en: A celebration of collective creativity from WEPN members.
description.cy: Dathliad o greadigrwydd ar y cyd gan aelodau WEPN.

description.en: Debut compilation supporting The Moon venue during lockdown.
description.cy: Casgliad cyntaf WEPN i gefnogi'r lleoliad The Moon yn ystod y cyfnod clo.
